Issue.summary: pvtdata fetch error on committer peer
Issue.description: DEBU 2a96^ 0m Sleeping 5s ^ 36m2018-12-21 17:54:25.238 KST gossip/privdata fetch -> DEBU 2a97^ 0m Total members in channel: ^ 36m2018-12-21 17:54:25.238 KST gossip/privdata fetch -> DEBU 2a98^ 0m Total members that fit some digest: ^ 33m2018-12-21 17:54:25.238 KST gossip/privdata fetch -> WARN 2a99^ 0m Do not know any peer in the channel( kosgldcurkrw ) that matches the policies , aborting ^ 33m2018-12-21 17:54:25.238 KST gossip/privdata fetchFromPeers -> WARN 2a9a^ 0m Failed fetching private data for block 1832 from peers: Empty membership =========================================================== collection { "name": "Endorsers", "policy": "OR('KosOrgMSP.member', 'IssuerOrgMSP.member','Bank1OrgMSP.member')", "requiredPeerCount": 0, "maxPeerCount": 3, "blockToLive":0 }, { "name": "IssuerOrgMSP", "policy": "OR('KosOrgMSP.member', 'IssuerOrgMSP.member','Bank1OrgMSP.member')", "requiredPeerCount": 0, "maxPeerCount": 3, "blockToLive":0 }, { "name": "Bank1OrgMSP", "policy": "OR('KosOrgMSP.member', 'IssuerOrgMSP.member','Bank1OrgMSP.member')", "requiredPeerCount": 0, "maxPeerCount": 3, "blockToLive":0 }, { "name": "Firm1OrgMSP", "policy": "OR('Firm1OrgMSP.member','KosOrgMSP.member', 'IssuerOrgMSP.member','Bank1OrgMSP.member')", "requiredPeerCount": 0, "maxPeerCount": 4, "blockToLive":0 }, { "name": "Firm2OrgMSP", "policy": "OR('Firm2OrgMSP.member','KosOrgMSP.member', 'IssuerOrgMSP.member','Bank1OrgMSP.member')", "requiredPeerCount": 0, "maxPeerCount": 4, "blockToLive":0 } ========================================================== endorse policy -P "AND ('KosOrgMSP.member','IssuerOrgMSP.member', 'Bank1OrgMSP.member')" \ >
